title: Kadhal Azhivathilai Song Lyrics Kadhal Azhivathilai
stanzas: <div>Kadhal Azhivathilai (kadhal deepavali) Song Lyrics Kadhal Azhivathilai

Kadhal azhivathillai
kadhal alai pol oaivathillai
kadhal vaa endraal
varuvathillai
kadhal po endral
povathillai

oru mura nenachuvittaa
marakkavum mudiyaadhu.
neruppu vachi suttaa kooda
kadhal nenju vegaathu.

solladi solladi en kadhaliye
ne sonnadhu sonnadhuthaan
